articles.summary: The first legs of the Champions League playoffs will continue this evening. After the defeats of Juventus and Atalanta, Inter are also on the field this evening in the difficult away game at Bodo.

articles.title: CM: When Gimenez should return for Milan and the two reasons it could be crucial
articles.summary: AC Milan’s Santiago Gimenez has been out since December 18th, but his return is getting closer with each passing day.
